comments.author: Steve
comments.body: I think I'm going to let some air out of Lenski's tires. That guy looked like Little Richard dancing on the pedals today. Infernal pace!

comments.author: Werner
comments.body: Steve helped me pick out a bike yesterday for the ride. It made me feel like a little kid again! I rode it up super sunshine, but I think I was too late. Didn't see any of you. Here's a picture of me on my new [bike!](http://www.google.com/imgres?imgurl=http://www.blogcdn.com/www.bloggingstocks.com/media/2007/03/harley3.jpg&imgrefurl=http://www.bloggingstocks.com/2007/03/09/harley-davidson-not-running-hog-wild/&usg=__i8MaIJoiGVSX8T_16PXJ2JCvGzA=&h=500&w=500&sz=45&hl=en&start=31&zoom=1&tbnid=xyr7yxh2Uop3HM:&tbnh=151&tbnw=170&prev=/images%3Fq%3Dharley%2Bdavidson%26hl%3Den%26biw%3D1439%26bih%3D962%26gbv%3D2%26tbs%3Disch:1&itbs=1&iact=hc&vpx=760&vpy=633&dur=155&hovh=225&hovw=225&tx=107&ty=144&ei=E312TMHOEMH-8AbX1oziBg&oei=rHx2TOuaI4P_8Aay8pDsBQ&esq=19&page=2&ndsp=30&ved=1t:429,r:15,s:31) Thanks Steve, for the help!
